title: Resume
body: Efficiency-driven Full Stack Software Engineer building robust software with intuitive user interfaces. Earned a Certificate in Full Stack Software Engineering from the University of Minnesota and a Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing from the University of Northwestern. Proactive approach to development that leverages background in marketing. Strengths in technical ability, expedited turnaround time, leadership and communication.

dropdowns.Technical Skills: Java, C#, Python, Javascript, Typescript, SQL, GraphQL, .NET, ASP.NET, .NET MAUI, React, Angular, Node.js, Liquid (Shopify)

Projects.title: “Espresso” App
list: Summary: Cross-platform project management app built on MAUI.
Role: Lead Engineer
Tools: .NET, ASP.NET, .NET MAUI, XAML

Projects.title: Bare Home Ecommerce Site
list: Summary: Ecommerce website deployed on Shopify backend.
Role: Front-End Developer
Tools: Javascript ES6+, CSS3, HTML5, jQuery, Liquid (Shopify), Bootstrap

Projects.title: Wolf.IO Stock Trading App
list: Summary: Live stock tracker that saves user trades (group project).
Role: Contributor, REST API Engineer
Tools: React, Node, CSS3, GitHub, Bootstrap, Ignite.UI

Projects.title: holiDATE Marketing Tool
list: Summary: Marketing tool for campaign management (group project).
Role: Project Manager
Tools: Javascript ES6+, Node, CSS3, HTML5, GitHub, jQuery, Bootstrap

Projects.title: Jack Bittner Portfolio Website
list: Summary: Personal website deployed on Hostgator file server.
Role: Sole Author
Tools: Javascript ES6+, Node, CSS3, HTML5, GitHub, jQuery

title: Digital Marketing Generalist
Jan 2023-Oct 2023
Bare Home
Columbus, MN
Experience.text:
Developed web and video content for marketing purposes.
Key Accomplishments:
list: Deployed GTM Container for analyzing web traffic and installed Google Analytics.
Managed promotional email campaigns through Klaviyo CRM.
Collaborated with stakeholders to push content to website, email and social media.
Managed Google Ads account and insured fiscal responsibility in ad spend.
Oversaw focus group research in shareholders for product development.
Created web pages for ecommerce and customer engagement.
Produced video YouTube and Amazon ads with 2D motion graphics.

title: Media Producer
Jan 2019-Oct 2023
Bullish Moose
Blaine, MN
Experience.text:
Created freelance media production business that offers diverse array of services.
Key Accomplishments:
list: Completed 2-year Video Production contract for local non-profit organization.
Rendered animation services to local non-profit organization.
Edited series of YouTube videos for tech content creator based in Japan.
Designed website for real-estate professional.
Produced social media advertisements for local fast-food chain.
